participants: cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify

messages.message:
Running into the "Something went wrong" screen when trying to open a folder on iB (both on prod and dogfood). Not sure who to file this bug ticket with.

Loom video here: https://www.loom.com/share/59d005af305b4b74bc7a70c268811927

messages.sender: cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify
messages.message: any js errors in the console?
Can you also try clicking the button to show the log? That should show the error too
@cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify here is what occurs when I I try to open the folder
@Jessica which button?
@Jessica @naveen this might be a duplicate of a bug i’ve filed  — there’s a folder name with the string `''` likely causing this
cc @Heymian
it’s a bug in the UI (cause it shouldn’t die a terrible death in this case) and a bug with the filesystem API (which shouldn’t accept `''` as a valid file name)
I'm trying to open this: https://dogfood.instabase.com/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/BofA/HLCT/architecture-mvp/router/scripts/
try to hit that path with a `list_dir`  @naveen
@Chetan it looks like I can access see the files from the API.

Hey, looking into this now!
let’s hit `scripts` with that @naveen, what does it contain?
thx @Jessica!
It looks like it's the error chetan said, that does have a file with an empty name

@Jessica @Chetan Yup, when I list the contents inside of `scripts` we see an empty folder:
```{'full_path': 'ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase '
               'Drive/poc/BofA/HLCT/architecture-mvp/router/scripts',
  'metadata': {'modified_timestamp': None,
               'size': None,
               'source_url': None,
               'type': 'unknown'},

  'perms': {'can_delete': True, 'can_read': True, 'can_write': True},
  'type': 'folder'}```
let’s see if we can use the delete API to delete it. that should fix this folder for you @naveen
And then I will try to prioritize the ticket to get this fixed

@Jessica @Chetan it might be important to note that I was previously attempting to duplicate this entire folder. I was running into issues and I filed a usability bug here: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/PFK-79?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNThlYzlhM2FjMTE4NGJkYTljODdjMWU1ZDg0OGIyYjciLCJwIjoiaiJ9
